tables: CREATE TABLE user_account (user_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE, user_email VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, user_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, user_password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_group_id INT, user_role INT)

CREATE TABLE exercises (exercise_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, equipment VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(50), reps INT, sets INT, duration INT, user_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (exercise_id))
ALTER TABLE exercises ADD CONSTRAINT fk_user_id_e FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_account(user_id)

CREATE TABLE workout_log (record_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE, user_id INT NOT NULL, exercise_id INT, log_date DATE NOT NULL, description TEXT, number_of_set INT, status ENUM('Todo', 'Doing', 'Done') DEFAULT 'Todo', priority INT CHECK (priority BETWEEN 0 AND 10), start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP, total_time INT, PRIMARY KEY (record_id))
ALTER TABLE workout_log ADD CONSTRAINT fk_user_id_l FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_account(user_id)
ALTER TABLE workout_log ADD CONSTRAINT fk_exercise_id_l FOREIGN KEY (exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(exercise_id)

CREATE TABLE workout_plan (plan_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id INT NOT NULL, exercise_id INT NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE, target_sets INT, target_reps INT, target_duration INT, frequency_type ENUM('daily', 'weekly', 'monthly', 'custom') NOT NULL, frequency_value INT NOT NULL, days_of_week SET('monday', 'tuesday', 'wednesday', 'thursday', 'friday', 'saturday', 'sunday'), preferred_time TIME, priority INT CHECK (priority BETWEEN 0 AND 10), status ENUM('active', 'paused', 'completed', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'active', reminder_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (plan_id))
ALTER TABLE workout_plan ADD CONSTRAINT fk_user_id_p FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_account(user_id)
ALTER TABLE workout_plan ADD CONSTRAINT fk_exercise_id_p FOREIGN KEY (exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(exercise_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_workout_plan_dates ON workout_plan(start_date, end_date)
